sections.heading: Overview
content:
Author of Endometriosis: One Woman's Journey and host of the
Endometriosis Interactive Support and Information web site at www.jenniferlewis.com , Jennifer Marie
Lewis has given a face, a name and, most important, a voice of experience and
wisdom to the personal pain of endometriosis by sharing her own medical and
emotional saga, which began when she was only 15.

For a decade, Lewis endured misdiagnoses and misconceptions about her
endometriosis, which ultimately led to bouts of debilitating surgeries and poor
health, lost wages, and lost intimacy and depression. Only when Lewis learned
to become her own best health advocate did she learn the truth about her
condition, find appropriate medical treatment, and begin to regain her
dignity.
